queryData.mainquery: select count(subc.SUBSCRIPTION_ID) as count, subc.CREATED_TIME as CREATED_TIME, api.API_NAME, api.CREATED_BY as API_CREATED_BY, app.NAME, app.CREATED_BY as APP_CREATED_BY, api.API_VERSION from AM_API api, AM_APPLICATION app, AM_SUBSCRIPTION subc where api.API_ID=subc.API_ID AND app.APPLICATION_ID=subc.APPLICATION_ID AND api.CONTEXT {{contextCondition}} {{apiName}} AND (subc.CREATED_TIME between '{{timeFrom}}' AND '{{timeTo}}') group by api.API_NAME, subc.CREATED_TIME, api.CREATED_BY, app.NAME, app.CREATED_BY, api.API_VERSION
